review: Second one I've bought and I like them both. My Samsung Smart TV has many of the same features, but like most Smart TVs, it has numerous interruptions especially with You Tube. This is great to mirror your IPhone or IPad especially to view pictures. Only down side, it doesn't readily support Amazon Prime vides.It can also be used for video presentations from an IPAD/IPhone. Requires video projector and wireless router, but no internet required. Ther are several YouTube videos that show you how to do this.
